mods.abstract: Performance of That Little Boy Of Mine, written by Benny Meroff, Walter Hirsch, and Wayne King, recorded on September 13, 1951 at RCA Victor Studio in Hollywood, CA, and performed by Eddy Arnold (vocals), Guy Willis (guitar), Roy Wiggins (steel), Chuck Wright (bass), Skeeter Willis (fiddle), and Vic Willis (piano).
